data.text: @vixjax123 Pfizer vaccine has been discovered to be Gene therapy in scientific study: reverse transcribes itself into human liver cells DNA https://t.co/WHiIlw9j1j
@vixjax123 You are welcome. Happy to have helped. x
@StephSalgado00 Thank you for doing your blog about your experience.  It helped my decision making massively.
@vixjax123 Glad you were able to do this and that it all went went well. Agree that it's all too little and far too late. Definitely won't forget that we had to go to these lengths for our kids.

@vixjax123 @sstroschein2 I did this too in Dec & Jan. I’m eternally grateful to Vienna for the opportunity to protect my children. I will never forgive the UK government for knowingly harming a generation of children!
@vixjax123 We came here too to get our son vaccinated

@vixjax123 @drkashton42 Dr Ros Jones ex paediatrician is trying to stop it.

Sad that those who can’t afford trips to Vienna have to make do though!
@vixjax123 Was it at Vienna International Centre?
